subject: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Friend,
I am Dr Peterson Mengiardi, a member of the Independent Committee of Eminent Persons (ICEP), Switzerland.I have an important business to discuss with you. Please get back to me to this my private email bellow(
mdrpeider@gmail.com
).

subject: Re:   Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Dr. Peterson Mengiardi,

I'm delighted to receive your message and I'm intrigued by the prospect of discussing important business with you. Could you please provide more details about the nature of this business? I'm eager to learn more.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Paula

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Swiss Independent Commission of Experts
Seconde Guerre Mondiale Commission Bergier,
Badenerstrasse 141
Postfach 7589
8023 Zurich, Switzerland
Dear Friend,
I am Dr Peider Mengiardi, a member of the Independent Committee of Eminent
Persons (ICEP), Switzerland.
ICEP is charged with the responsibility of finding bank accounts in
Switzerland belonging to non-Swiss indigenes, which have remained dormant
since World War II. It may interest you to know that In January 13 2005,
the Swiss Bankers Association published a list of dormant accounts
originally opened by non-Swiss citizens. These accounts had been dormant
since the end of World War II (May 9, 1945). Most belonged to Holocaust
victims.
The continuing efforts of my office the Independent Committee of Eminent
Persons (ICEP) have since resulted in the discovery of additional dormant
accounts 2700 in July, 2005.
And till date more are being discovered which you can confirm from the web.
In the process of my work a dormant account is discovered during my
investigation with a credit balance of $ 17,000,000 US dollar plus
accumulated interest belonging to a foreigner who has no relatives, the
beneficiary was murdered during the holocaust era, leaving no WILL and no
possible records for trace of heirs. The Claims Resolution Tribunal has
been mandated to report all unprocessed claims for permanent closure of
accounts and transfer of existing credit balance into the treasury of
Switzerland government as provided by the law for management of assets of
deceased beneficiaries who died interstate (living no wills) I decided to
write you as our regime is at hand for dissolving and all deadlines to file
claims relating to the Swiss Banks Settlement have expire on assistance of
our claiming this fund.
Due to the sensitive nature of my job, I need a partner outside of
Switzerland to stand as a beneficiary for processing the claims. Being a
top executive at ICEP, I have all secret details and necessary contacts to
enable you to be validated as claimant and the fund sent to you without any
PROBLEM.
All that is required is for you to provide me your details for processing
of the necessary legal and administrative claim documents for release of
claim amount to you as I will pay all the relative fees to the lawyer to
make sure you are validated a confirmed beneficiary and I trust his
experience and believe he will handle all the processes legally.
Service integrity, honesty and dedication to success is my primary focus.I
have worked out perfect modality to ensure that your integrity is not
compromised and that of mine is not compromised too as I occupy a sensitive
position in my office and highly respected within the Christian community .
Many people who have full records of their relatives bank details have
successfully claimed their inheritance and paid in full. List of claimants
who have been paid are listed on the website for verification. Visit the
website below to see the list of claimants who have been paid:
Provide me with your full name, address, and telephone / fax. The money
will be sent to a secure account in your name, because you will be acting
as the next of kin to the deceased person and also invest it into a very
lucrative business in your country after claims.
Since I am contacting you for this deal and will bear mostly all expenses
60 per cent is for me, 40 percent of the total amount is due for you.Please
remember that NO DOCUMENT WILL BE OFFICIALLY SIGNED BY YOU, i will assign a
lawyer to do that here on your behalf HENCE NO LEGAL LIENS OR ENCUMBRANCE
OR PROBLEM.
You can find additional information about holocaust money through the
following websites:
The below information is needed for confirmation from you for the easy and
effectiveness to the procession by the Holocaust processing center
Switzerland:
I find myself privileged to have this information and this is a great
opportunity for a lifetime of success. For urgent procession, the below
information is needed for confirmation from you for the easy and
effectiveness to the procession by the Holocaust processing center
Switzerland:
1} Full name
2} Full Address
3} Full scanned page of your international passport.
4} bank account / information.
5} working telephone number.
Thanks once more as i expect your urgent reply via the above e-mail.
Yours Sincerely,
Dr Peider Mengiardi

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Dr. Peider Mengiardi,

I am truly fascinated by your message and the work you are doing with ICEP. The history of World War II and its aftermath is a subject that has always intrigued me, especially the stories of those who suffered during the Holocaust.

It's quite interesting to learn about these dormant accounts and how they have remained untouched for so many years. I can only imagine the painstaking efforts it must take to discover them and then try to find any possible heirs.

However, I'm a bit confused as to why you would need my assistance in this matter. Could you please elaborate more on what exactly my role would be? And how did you come across my contact information?

Also, could you provide me with more details about this foreigner whose account was discovered? It's quite sad to hear that he was murdered during the Holocaust era and left no will or trace of heirs.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Paula

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Swiss Independent Commission of Experts
Seconde Guerre Mondiale Commission Bergier,
Badenerstrasse 141
Postfach 7589
8023 Zurich, Switzerland

Hi Dear Paula,

I received your mail and wish to respond in order to clarify
certain issues. You are to be adequately briefed in my proposition, that
the work will start with the lawyer immediately as I have realized
US$89,000.00 for payment of legal service charge and to offset related fees
for your legal right, of documentation.

I raised this money by mortgaging my beautiful home as I am sure that in a
few weeks time, we will have success and I will be glad to use part of my
funds to purchase great homes in different parts of the world. First, I
will assure you that this business is risk and trouble free.

I contacted you for this important business being a total stranger due to
the great need to involve a foreigner who will act and receive this fund in
his account. The account bears a contract Name to a foreigner published
lists which contain all types of dormant accounts, including
interest-bearing savings accounts, securities accounts, safe deposit boxes,
custody accounts, and non-interest-bearing transaction accounts. Numbered
accounts are also included.

Interest is paid on accounts that were interest bearing when established.
But my only worry is the security and safety of this fund once transferred
to your account as we have not known before, and the bank management will
never approve the fund to a local account or indigenous name. We also have
a strict banking policy which does not allow citizens of my country to
transfer funds out to abroad but a foreigner has unlimited right to
transfer funds as far as internet banking procedure is concerned in
switzland.

Based on these reasons, I now decided to contact you so that you can
receive this fund in your account and we share it according to my earlier
stated percentages. Right after the procession, this money will belongs to
you or your company if any and by virtue of declaration that will be stated
on the affidavit to be sworn in the high court, you will have been
irrevocably declared as the true owner and beneficiary of the fund being
the next of kin of the deceased holocaust vicitims.

By this declaration, you are authorized to proceed and claim the funds.
Therefore, your only commitment to this magnitude transaction is to access
this fund through an internet banking after securing the necessary
accreditation documents which legalized the transaction and you follow the
directives of the payment banking officers, then receive the money into
your account a matter of time constraint.

Note, after procession of your documents, you will always speak
authoritatively when speaking with the officer (s) sitting in the bank that
you need your money to be paid immediately.Lastly, remember the officers
and government do not know the genesis of this transaction and you must
keep our involvement confidential, all they know is that, the funds belong
to your name in documentation, so no mistakes.

As i said, the procedure is safe and risk free. I will use my good office
to ensure that the process is quickly completed and that the money is
quickly and swiftly transferred to safe account in your name in any of the
payout banks from where you can start accessing the money through the
internet banking service without traveling out of your country and you can
issue wire transfer instructions to your country and to any other part of
the world, making it easy and risk free to bank the funds and transact with
it without risk of unnecessary explanation to the banks in your country
asking for where the funds came from.

Hopefully,I will be directing you on the next process until we submit for
approval of fund release. we will receive the notarized affidavit by next
and also submit for approval of fund release same week.Please visit the
website and you will see the list of the people who are already smiling for
their new wealth.

http://www.crt-ii.org/_awards/index.phtm

As the deadline to file has expired and my resignation is approaching, I
have chosen that part of my own funds will be invested in purchase of
stocks, real estate in the Bahamas and North America, and investment in the
hospitality industry in Hawaii.

I also want to donate to tsunami and use hurricane victims,Please send
reply to me via email with the below information is needed for confirmation
from you for the easy and effectiveness to the procession by the Holocaust
processing center Switzerland:

1} Full name
2} Full Address
3} Full scanned page of your international passport.
4} bank account / information.
5} working telephone number.


Thanks once more for your co-operating

Dr Peider Mengiardi

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Dr. Peider Mengiardi,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting proposition you've presented here, and I must say it's a bit overwhelming to take in all at once.

I'm curious about the process of securing the necessary documents that would legalize my involvement. Could you elaborate more on what these documents are and how I would go about obtaining them?

Also, could you explain more about the internet banking procedure in Switzerland? I'm not very familiar with it and would like to understand better before proceeding.

Lastly, I noticed that you mentioned a list of people who are already benefiting from this opportunity. Is there a way for me to get in touch with any of them? It would be great to hear firsthand experiences.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Paula

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Thank you very much my good friend for you response and questions,  I might
not be in a position to make you believe me now but with time, you will
reap from the fruit of your labor. I always maintain one proverb which has
made me confident in my life which says that' What Shall it profit a man to
gain the whole World and lose his own life. The riches of the Faithful are
in Heaven and that was why I took solace to make sure you receive this
holocaust fund.  Some people have already received theres as i mentioned in
my previous email, these are some of the people who are already smiling for
their new wealth.one British man (Mr. Owen Cole with telephone number
+447404059422). So, in my daily prayers I call God to desist me in anything
like cheating and the truth is that; I cannot cheat  or deceive any person
because of my religion and position in the lord.  This stage is the most
tempting part of my life and it must be given for Gods divine Love and
favor in all fronts.

So , you  are my Lovely sister too in this race as a sister, we are one.
This is for real.

 I will advise you to contact this woman Mrs. Lisa Kidd From America with
Email:  (kiddlisa120@aol.com)
she  received hers  last 3 weeks and she is happy and have started using
her funds,  And also Mr Dane Williams from UK also with the phone number
because He received his own funds last two months  with email (
danesafe@yandex.com)(+447404059422) .
As for the process of obtaining the legal documents,I have contracted an
International lawyer who based in Spain and well  experienced on processing
of holocaust payments documents and I will forward Him your informations as
soon as you send it to me so that He will start the process of obtaining
the fund release affidavit in your name so that it will be submited for the
release of the funds.
For the internet banking, it is the process of online banking which you
will be able to transfer your fund to your account through on line process
because after the release of the fund to you, the online informations will
be giving to you and the bankers will direct you on how to make the
transfer .
I am looking forward to immediate conclusion because very soon we will
return all the unclaimed holocaust funds to the board.
The Lord is our strength.
 Take care and Note that your delivery charge will not change my life, so I
have nothing to do with your money.
 Please reach me with your informations so that we can proceed and attached
bellow are my identities for you to know whom you are daeling with.

I am waiting to hear from you as soon as possible. Please note that this
has to be confidential.

Yours Sincerely,
Dr. Peider Mengiardi,

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Dr. Peider Mengiardi,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's really interesting to hear about the work you're doing and the people who have already benefited from it. I'm glad to know that Mr. Owen Cole, Mrs. Lisa Kidd, and Mr Dane Williams are all happy with their funds.

I'm curious about this online banking process you mentioned. Could you explain a bit more about how it works? Is it safe and secure?

Also, could you tell me more about the legal process involved in obtaining these funds? You mentioned a lawyer based in Spain - does he handle all the paperwork?

Lastly, I'd like to know more about the board that oversees these unclaimed holocaust funds. Who are they and what is their role in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Paula

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Hello my good friend,

Online banking is being able to access you fund through on line app and you
can transfer to any account you want . But the bankers can equaly transfer
the fund on your behalf if you are not conversant with online banking it is
safer.  The board do not have any roles on this and the lawyer will take
care of the legal process on your behalf.  Send me the informations I
requested so that I can contact the lawyer with to beggin the process.

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about online banking. It sounds very convenient and efficient. I'm not very familiar with it, but I'm eager to learn more.

You mentioned that the bankers can also transfer funds on my behalf. That's interesting! How does that work exactly? Do they need any specific information from me to do this?

Also, you mentioned a lawyer handling the legal process. Could you please elaborate on what this legal process involves? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Paula

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
I believe the lawyer will tell you more on that and any other basic
informations you need. Send me your necessar informations i requested so
that we can proceed.

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm really interested in learning more about this. Could you please elaborate on what the lawyer will tell me? Also, could you clarify what necessary requests I need to send for us to proceed? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Paula

body:

body:
